node.title: The Atheist Who Found God: Part 1
node.description: Wes Peppers shares his experience of coming to accept Christ at the age of 22 after being an atheist/agnostic for several years. A rising football star at the time, he shares how he quit college football and a life of reckless living in order to go into full time ministry for the Lord.  Since that time Wes has served globally as an evangelist, speaker, and teacher.
